short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stop corona virus related stuff from stressing you out when browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of getting stressed out by looking non-stop at headlines explaining how we are all doomed?

I am.

I didn't create this extension for you to pretend like nothing is going on in the world, but just to help people get a breather from this mess every once in a while.

It's great to stay informed about what is happening around the world, but if you're tired of it and want to take a quick break from all the stress then download COBLOCK - 19.
This extension will remove any article/search result/anything in your browser containing virus-related keywords such as "covid", "corona", "virus", etc.

Additionally, you add your own custom words you don't want to see. I'm not naming any names, but if you're tired of reading about certain political or pop-culture people, you can banish them from your browsing experience them as well.
